dcterms:creator: Xianda Zhou
William Yang Wang
dcterms:description: Mojitalk dataset consists of 596,959 post and response pairs from Twitter, with each response labeled by one emoji which indicates the response emotion. There are 64 emoji labels in total with unbalanced distribution.
dcterms:title: Mojitalk

dcterms:creator: Biao Zhang
Deyi Xiong
Hong Duan
Min Zhang
dcterms:description: PersonaChat is a one-to-one multi-turn conversation dataset where conversations are revolving around personas established by four to six persona sentences.
dcterms:title: PersonaChat

dcterms:creator: Hannah Rashkin
Eric Michael Smith
Margaret Li
Y-Lan Boureau
dcterms:description: Empathetic-Dialogues is a one-to-one multi-turn conversation dataset where conversations are mostly about situations that happened to one of the speakers, with the goal of making users more engaging.
dcterms:title: Empathetic-Dialogues
